description:
FOAF is a project devoted to linking people and information using the Web.  Regardless of whether information is in people's heads, in physical or digital documents, or in the form of factual data, it can be linked.  FOAF integrates three kinds of network: social networks of human collaboration, friendship and association; representational networks that describe a simplified view of a cartoon universe in factual terms, and information networks that use Web-based linking to share independently published descriptions of this inter-connected world.  FOAF does not compete with socially-oriented Web sites; rather it provides an approach in which different sites can tell different parts of the larger story, and by which users can retain some control over their information in a non-proprietary format.

Version: 0.1.0

Agent.label: Agent
Agent.description: An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).

LabelProperty.label: Label Property
LabelProperty.description: A foaf:LabelProperty is any RDF property with texual values that serve as labels.

Project.label: Project
Project.description: A project (a collective endeavour of some kind).

account.label: account
account.description: Indicates an account held by this agent.

accountName.label: account name
accountName.description: Indicates the name (identifier) associated with this online account.

accountServiceHomepage.label: account service homepage
accountServiceHomepage.description: Indicates a homepage of the service provide for this online account.

age.label: age
age.description: The age in years of some agent.

based_near.label: based near
based_near.description: A location that something is based near, for some broadly human notion of near.

birthday.label: birthday
birthday.description: The birthday of this Agent, represented in mm-dd string form, eg. '12-31'.

currentProject.label: current project
currentProject.description: A current project this person works on.

depicts.label: depicts
depicts.description: A thing depicted in this representation.

dnaChecksum.label: DNA checksum
dnaChecksum.description: A checksum for the DNA of some thing. Joke.

familyName.label: familyName
familyName.description: The family name of some person.

family_name.label: family_name
family_name.description: The family name of some person.

firstName.label: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of a person.

focus.label: focus
focus.description: The underlying or 'focal' entity associated with some SKOS-described concept.

fundedBy.label: funded by
fundedBy.description: An organization funding a project or person.

geekcode.label: geekcode
geekcode.description: A textual geekcode for this person, see http://www.geekcode.com/geek.html

gender.label: gender
gender.description: The gender of this Agent (typically but not necessarily 'male' or 'female').

givenName.label: Given name
givenName.description: The given name of some person.

givenname.label: Given name
givenname.description: The given name of some person.

holdsAccount.label: account
holdsAccount.description: Indicates an account held by this agent.

img.label: image
img.description: An image that can be used to represent some thing (ie. those depictions which are particularly representative of something, eg. one's photo on a homepage).

interest.label: interest
interest.description: A page about a topic of interest to this person.

isPrimaryTopicOf.label: is primary topic of
isPrimaryTopicOf.description: A document that this thing is the primary topic of.

knows.label: knows
knows.description: A person known by this person (indicating some level of reciprocated interaction between the parties).

lastName.label: lastName
lastName.description: The last name of a person.

made.label: made
made.description: Something that was made by this agent.

maker.label: maker
maker.description: An agent that made this thing.

mbox.label: personal mailbox
mbox.description: A personal mailbox, ie. an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the first owner of this mailbox. This is a 'static inverse functional property', in that  there is (across time and change) at most one individual that ever has any particular value for foaf:mbox.

mbox_sha1sum.label: sha1sum of a personal mailbox URI name
mbox_sha1sum.description: The sha1sum of the URI of an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the  first owner of the mailbox.

member.label: member
member.description: Indicates a member of a Group

membershipClass.label: membershipClass
membershipClass.description: Indicates the class of individuals that are a member of a Group

nick.label: nickname
nick.description: A short informal nickname characterising an agent (includes login identifiers, IRC and other chat nicknames).

page.label: page
page.description: A page or document about this thing.

pastProject.label: past project
pastProject.description: A project this person has previously worked on.

phone.label: phone
phone.description: A phone,  specified using fully qualified tel: URI scheme (refs: http://www.w3.org/Addressing/schemes.html#tel).

plan.label: plan
plan.description: A .plan comment, in the tradition of finger and '.plan' files.

primaryTopic.label: primary topic
primaryTopic.description: The primary topic of some page or document.

publications.label: publications
publications.description: A link to the publications of this person.

schoolHomepage.label: schoolHomepage
schoolHomepage.description: A homepage of a school attended by the person.

status.label: status
status.description: A string expressing what the user is happy for the general public (normally) to know about their current activity.

tipjar.label: tipjar
tipjar.description: A tipjar document for this agent, describing means for payment and reward.

topic.label: topic
topic.description: A topic of some page or document.

topic_interest.label: topic_interest
topic_interest.description: A thing of interest to this person.

weblog.label: weblog
weblog.description: A weblog of some thing (whether person, group, company etc.).

workInfoHomepage.label: work info homepage
workInfoHomepage.description: A work info homepage of some person; a page about their work for some organization.

workplaceHomepage.label: workplace homepage
workplaceHomepage.description: A workplace homepage of some person; the homepage of an organization they work for.
